languages.text: "Помилуйте, расположение подданных можно купить за совершенно небольшую цену — снизьте налог, устройте праздник или накормите голодающих — подобные жесты раз в цикл возвысят вас в глазах челяди, словно благословение Его самого".

traits.locale_text: "Помилуйте, расположенние подданных можно купить за совершенно небольшую цену — снизьте налог, устройте праздник или накормите голодающих — подобные жесты раз в оборот возвысят вас в глазах челяди, словно благословение Его самого".

languages.text: "On the contrary, the loyalty of subjects can be bought at a pittance — lower a tax, throw them a festival, or feed the needy — a gracious gesture once every cycle will exalt you in the eyes of the rabble as if it were His own blessing."
languages.original_text: "Помилуйте, расположение подданных можно купить за совершенно небольшую цену — снизьте налог, устройте праздник или накормите голодающих — подобные жесты раз в цикл возвысят вас в глазах челяди, словно благословение Его самого".

traits.locale_text: "I beg to differ! The loyalty of subjects can be bought at a pittance — lower a tax, throw them a festival or feed the needy — a gracious gesture once every rotation will exalt you in the eyes of the rabble just like His blessing would."

"I beg to differ! The loyalty of subjects can be bought at a pittance — lower a tax, throw them a festival or feed the needy — a gracious gesture once every rotation will exalt you in the eyes of the rabble just like His blessing would."

"On the contrary, the loyalty of subjects can be bought at a pittance — lower a tax, throw them a festival, or feed the needy — a gracious gesture once every cycle will exalt you in the eyes of the rabble as if it were His own blessing."

"On the contrary, the loyalty of subjects can be bought at a pittance — lower a tax, throw them a festival, or feed the needy — a gracious gesture once every cycle will exalt you in the eyes of the rabble as if it were His own blessing."

"On the contrary, the loyalty of subjects can be bought at a pittance — lower a tax, throw them a festival, or feed the needy — a gracious gesture once every cycle will exalt you in the eyes of the rabble as if it were His own blessing."

languages.text: “恰恰相反，臣民的忠诚可以用很小的代价收买。比如说降低税收、为他们举行节日庆典，或是为贫困的人提供食物。每个周期都摆出一次这样的亲切姿态，那些乌合之众便会崇拜你，仿佛你是神皇本人的祝福一样。”
languages.original_text: "On the contrary, the loyalty of subjects can be bought at a pittance — lower a tax, throw them a festival, or feed the needy — a gracious gesture once every cycle will exalt you in the eyes of the rabble as if it were His own blessing."

traits.locale_text: “恰恰相反，臣民的忠诚可以用很小的代价收买。比如说降低税收、为他们举行节日庆典，或是为贫困的人提供食物。每个周期都摆出一次这样的亲切姿态，那些乌合之众便会崇拜你，仿佛你是神皇本人的祝福一样。”

languages.text: «Por el contrario, la lealtad de los súbditos se vende por una miseria. Una bajada de impuestos, un festival, comida para los hambrientos... un gesto de gracia cada ciclo basta para que la plebe le exalte como si fuera la bendición del propio Emperador».
languages.original_text: "On the contrary, the loyalty of subjects can be bought at a pittance — lower a tax, throw them a festival, or feed the needy — a gracious gesture once every cycle will exalt you in the eyes of the rabble as if it were His own blessing."

traits.locale_text: «Por el contrario, la lealtad de los súbditos se vende por una miseria. Una bajada de impuestos, un festival, comida para los hambrientos... un gesto de gracia cada ciclo basta para que la plebe le exalte como si fuera la bendición del propio Emperador».

languages.text: 「それどころか、臣民の忠誠心ははした金で買うことができる。税金を下げたり、祭りを開いたり、困窮者に食事を与えたりすればいいのだ。定期的に一度、寛大な仕草を見せてやるだけで、まるで神の祝福を受けたかのように庶民の目には映ることだろう」
languages.original_text: "On the contrary, the loyalty of subjects can be bought at a pittance — lower a tax, throw them a festival, or feed the needy — a gracious gesture once every cycle will exalt you in the eyes of the rabble as if it were His own blessing."

traits.locale_text: 「それどころか、臣民の忠誠心ははした金で買うことができる。税金を下げたり、祭りを開いたり、困窮者に食事を与えたりすればいいのだ。定期的に一度、寛大な仕草を見せてやるだけで、まるで神の祝福を受けたかのように庶民の目には映ることだろう」

languages.text: "Im Gegenteil, die Loyalität von Untertanen kann für ein Taschengeld erkauft werden – senkt eine Steuer, gebt ein Fest, nährt die Bedürftigen. Eine großzügige Geste pro Zyklus erhebt Euch in den Augen des Pöbels wie ein Segen von Ihm selbst."
languages.original_text: "On the contrary, the loyalty of subjects can be bought at a pittance — lower a tax, throw them a festival, or feed the needy — a gracious gesture once every cycle will exalt you in the eyes of the rabble as if it were His own blessing."

traits.locale_text: "Im Gegenteil, die Loyalität von Untertanen kann für ein Taschengeld erkauft werden – senkt eine Steuer, gebt ein Fest, nährt die Bedürftigen. Eine großzügige Geste pro Zyklus erhebt Euch in den Augen des Pöbels wie ein Segen von Ihm selbst."

languages.text: « Au contraire, il suffit de peu pour gagner la loyauté de ses sujets : baisser les impôts, organiser un festival, nourrir les pauvres... Un simple geste de bonté, et la multitude vous vénère comme un dieu. »
languages.original_text: "On the contrary, the loyalty of subjects can be bought at a pittance — lower a tax, throw them a festival, or feed the needy — a gracious gesture once every cycle will exalt you in the eyes of the rabble as if it were His own blessing."

traits.locale_text: « Au contraire, il suffit de peu pour gagner la loyauté de ses sujets : baisser les impôts, organiser un festival, nourrir les pauvres... Un simple geste de bonté, et la multitude vous vénère comme un dieu. »

languages.text: "Tam aksine tebaanın sadakati, küçük bir ücret karşılığında satın alınabilir. Vergileri azalt, şölen tertip et, ihtiyaç sahiplerini doyur. Her döngüde böyle cömert bir eylemde bulunmak seni ayaktakımının gözünde öylesine yükseltir ki seni bizzat O'nun bir lütfu olarak görmeye başlarlar."
languages.original_text: "On the contrary, the loyalty of subjects can be bought at a pittance — lower a tax, throw them a festival, or feed the needy — a gracious gesture once every cycle will exalt you in the eyes of the rabble as if it were His own blessing."

traits.locale_text: "Tam aksine, tebaalarının sadakati küçük bir ücret karşılığında satın alınabilir. Bir vergiyi indir, bir festival düzenle, ihtiyaç sahiplerini doyur. Her döngüde böyle cömert bir eylemde bulunmak seni ayaktakımının gözünde öylesine yükseltir ki seni bizzat O'nun bir lütfu olarak görmeye başlarlar."
